titleStmt.title: Londons loyalty to their King and countrey, and the Protestant religion,

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and published by a true Protestant and lover of his countrey.,

notesStmt.note: A reply to "The English currant" of 8 Sept. 1679.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
